name: Switcheroo Redirector Plus
description: Setup custom redirect rules for any http request i.e pages, scripts, images etc. Uses a simple string replace to do this.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com https://sentry.io 'unsafe-eval'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';font-src 'self' https://at.alicdn.com
